title: Nucleic Acid Reagents   schema
description: natural or engineered assay perturbagens built of a polynucleic structure, often used in the interference of specific sequences of DNA/RNA in cells, tissues, or animal models, including siRNA, shRNA, and guide RNAs for TALEN and CRISPR/CAS9.

NA_Name.title: NA_Name
NA_Name.description: The primary name of the siRNA or shRNA or any other genetic perturbagen as chosen by LINCS
NA_Name.schema:name: NA_Name
NA_Name.schema:description: The primary name of the siRNA or shRNA or any other genetic perturbagen as chosen by LINCS

items.title: NA_Alternative_Name
items.description: List of synonymous reagent names or other alternative names
items.schema:name: NA_Alternative_Name
items.schema:description: List of synonymous reagent names or other alternative names

items.title: NA_Alternative_ID
items.description: List of synonymous reagent IDs, or other alternative IDs
items.schema:name: NA_Alternative_ID
items.schema:description: List of synonymous reagent IDs, or other alternative IDs

items.title: NA_Center_Canonical_ID
items.description: LINCS DSGC-specific canonical ID; will be assigned by a given LINCS DSGC according to its reagent registration scheme
items.schema:name: NA_Center_Canonical_ID
items.schema:description: LINCS DSGC-specific canonical ID; will be assigned by a given LINCS DSGC according to its reagent registration scheme

items.title: NA_Relevant_Citations
items.description: Appropriate literature reference(s) (with PMIDs) for reagent's derivation, production, and/or validation
items.schema:name: NA_Relevant_Citations
items.schema:description: Appropriate literature reference(s) (with PMIDs) for reagent's derivation, production, and/or validation

items.title: NA_Center_Name
items.description: LINCS center using the genetic perturbagen
items.schema:name: NA_Center_Name
items.schema:description: LINCS center using the genetic perturbagen

items.title: NA_Center_Batch_ID
items.description: LINCS DSGC-specific batch ID; will be assigned by a given LINCS DSGC according to its reagent registration scheme
items.schema:name: NA_Center_Batch_ID
items.schema:description: LINCS DSGC-specific batch ID; will be assigned by a given LINCS DSGC according to its reagent registration scheme

items.title: NA_Provider_Name
items.description: Vendor or laboratory that supplied the reagent
items.schema:name: NA_Provider_Name
items.schema:description: Vendor or laboratory that supplied the reagent

items.title: NA_Provider_Catalog_ID
items.description: ID or catalogue number assigned to the reagent by the vendor or provider
items.schema:name: NA_Provider_Catalog_ID
items.schema:description: ID or catalogue number assigned to the reagent by the vendor or provider

items.title: NA_Provider_Batch_ID
items.description: Batch or lot number assigned to the reagent by the vendor or provider
items.schema:name: NA_Provider_Batch_ID
items.schema:description: Batch or lot number assigned to the reagent by the vendor or provider

NA_Probe_ID.title: NA_Probe_ID
NA_Probe_ID.description: ID of the siRNA, shRNA, sgRNA, etc. as listed in NCBI Probe database
NA_Probe_ID.schema:name: NA_Probe_ID
NA_Probe_ID.schema:description: ID of the siRNA, shRNA, sgRNA, etc. as listed in NCBI Probe database

items.title: NA_Type
items.description: A controlled vocabulary specifying whether the reagent is Coding or Non-coding
items.schema:name: NA_Type
items.schema:description: A controlled vocabulary specifying whether the reagent is Coding or Non-coding

items.title: NA_Subtype
items.description: A controlled vocabulary specifying the nucleic acid subtype. Coding subtypes: cDNA, Other. Non-coding subtypes: siRNA, sgRNA, shRNA, miRNA, Other
items.schema:name: NA_Subtype
items.schema:description: A controlled vocabulary specifying the nucleic acid subtype. Coding subtypes: cDNA, Other. Non-coding subtypes: siRNA, sgRNA, shRNA, miRNA, Other

items.title: NA_Delivery_Format
items.description: A controlled vocabulary specifying the format in which the perturbation was introduced. Can be DNA or RNA
items.schema:name: NA_Delivery_Format
items.schema:description: A controlled vocabulary specifying the format in which the perturbation was introduced. Can be DNA or RNA

items.title: NA_Mode
items.description: A controlled vocabulary specifying the mode of action of the reagent
items.schema:name: NA_Mode
items.schema:description: A controlled vocabulary specifying the mode of action of the reagent

items.title: NA_Target_Locus
items.description: The gene name of the target. Can be a gene name/ miRNA gene name or coordinates if no gene name is available
items.schema:name: NA_Target_Locus
items.schema:description: The gene name of the target. Can be a gene name/ miRNA gene name or coordinates if no gene name is available

items.title: NA_Target_Locus_Species
items.description: A controlled vocabulary specifying the species of the target locus
items.schema:name: NA_Target_Locus_Species
items.schema:description: A controlled vocabulary specifying the species of the target locus

items.title: NA_Target_Gene_ID
items.description: The NCBI Entrez Gene ID for the gene targeted by the siRNA, shRNA or sgRNA
items.schema:name: NA_Target_Gene_ID
items.schema:description: The NCBI Entrez Gene ID for the gene targeted by the siRNA, shRNA or sgRNA

items.title: NA_Transcript_ID
items.description: The NCBI Reference Sequence IDs of the transcripts that are being targeted by the reagent
items.schema:name: NA_Transcript_ID
items.schema:description: The NCBI Reference Sequence IDs of the transcripts that are being targeted by the reagent

NA_Sense_Sequence.title: NA_Sense_Sequence
NA_Sense_Sequence.description: The nucleotide sequence of the sense (passenger) strand of the siRNA, the processed shRNA or the sgRNA. The ORF sequence of the cDNA which eventually gets transcribed and translated
NA_Sense_Sequence.schema:name: NA_Sense_Sequence
NA_Sense_Sequence.schema:description: The nucleotide sequence of the sense (passenger) strand of the siRNA, the processed shRNA or the sgRNA. The ORF sequence of the cDNA which eventually gets transcribed and translated

items.title: NA_Validation_Information
items.description: Information about experimental verification of siRNA/shRNA activity; a reference (PubMed or other suitable reference) should be provided
items.schema:name: NA_Validation_Information
items.schema:description: Information about experimental verification of siRNA/shRNA activity; a reference (PubMed or other suitable reference) should be provided

NA_Driver_System.title: NA_Driver_System
NA_Driver_System.description: A free text field that describes the expression/driver system that was used. Examples include information about promoter, whether the expression was constitutive or inducible (and level/method of induction), or other dependencies that could effect output when the nucleic acid-based reagent is designed to be transcribed (and possible translated as protein)
NA_Driver_System.schema:name: NA_Driver_System
NA_Driver_System.schema:description: A free text field that describes the expression/driver system that was used. Examples include information about promoter, whether the expression was constitutive or inducible (and level/method of induction), or other dependencies that could effect output when the nucleic acid-based reagent is designed to be transcribed (and possible translated as protein)

schema:name: Nucleic Acid Reagents
